entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
